<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Request A Multiple Sections">8c2881f3836d221016455a55eeaad360</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>OnLoadStepHtml</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {

    var ga = new GlideAjax('GetStepHtml');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getStepHtml');
    ga.getXMLAnswer(function(response) {
        var htmlContent = response;

        g_form.setValue('step_html', htmlContent);
    });
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-05-24 11:23:14</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>28e9c74883f9a21016455a55eeaad3a7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OnLoadStepHtml</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="CatalogItem2Demo" source="x_1758036_catalogi">b6ea743b83e9221016455a55eeaad30b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CatalogItem2Demo">b6ea743b83e9221016455a55eeaad30b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_28e9c74883f9a21016455a55eeaad3a7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-05-24 13:57:20</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
